GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object that contains the specified article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments on a specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Accepts a comment object with a username and body, and serves the posted comment.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Accepts a votes increment object, and serves the article with the updated votes.
